capability.name: Mergers And Acquisitions Advisory
capability.definition: This Service Domain handles mergers and acquisition, IPO, MBO and LBO projects with the bank acting in the lead and/or subordinate role
capability.role: A fee or commission based project providing advice, execution, pricing and deal coordination and placement for M&A, IPO, MBO, LBO type transactions
capability.example: A corporate customer engages an investment bank to lead an M&A transaction on its behalf

key_features.name: Fee or commission based project execution
key_features.description: Enables fee or commission based project execution to support this service domain handles mergers and acquisition, ipo, mbo and lbo projects with the bank acting in the lead and/or subordinate role

key_features.name: Pricing and deal coordination
key_features.description: Enables pricing and deal coordination to support this service domain handles mergers and acquisition, ipo, mbo and lbo projects with the bank acting in the lead and/or subordinate role

key_features.name: Placement for M&A, IPO, LBO type transactions
key_features.description: Enables placement for m&a, ipo, lbo type transactions to support this service domain handles mergers and acquisition, ipo, mbo and lbo projects with the bank acting in the lead and/or subordinate role

key_features.name: Advisory services for complex transactions
key_features.description: Enables advisory services for complex transactions to support this service domain handles mergers and acquisition, ipo, mbo and lbo projects with the bank acting in the lead and/or subordinate role
